info.name: Median sulcus of fourth ventricle
info.description: The midline of the floor of the fourth ventricle (i.e. the rhomboid fossa) is marked by the median sulcus.  It simply divides the dorsal surface of the pons and medulla into right and left halves.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/8 Brain stem - dorsal view
